title: Physics of Sound and Music
description: Fundamental physical principals of sound production in musical instruments; woodwind, brass, strings, piano and percussion. Generation and interference of mechanical and sound waves; overtone series, musical scales and Fourier spectra of complex waves. Electronic sound recording and production. Hearing and voice. Auditorium and room acoustics. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE B3.
prerequisites: Passing score on ELM examination, or an ELM exemption, or credit in MATH 104
